subject: Re: [junit] testing a sax parser
msgSnippet: ... What part of the SAX parser are you trying to test? If you re just testing the callback methods, then I would invoke each method with a bunch of different
messageBody:
bskmohan wrote:
> hello group,
>
> i want to know how to test a sax parser that parses my xml
> file.here
> i have some doubts. 1)does testing a parser involves testing both the
> dtd and output generated by the parser or 2) testing only the output.
> Also pls specify any api regarding this in junit.

What part of the SAX parser are you trying to test? If you're just
testing the callback methods, then I would invoke each method with a
bunch of different parameters/parser states and make sure it does the
right thing. I would also have a couple of tests that invoke multiple
methods in a row, since they usually have to share state through fields.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
